title: Viscera Pots
description: Amalgamation of over 12 pots smashed together with orangic strands connecting them to one another, decorated with red glaze. A human heart lays upright in the middle of the pots, a white flower growing out of it's aorta. New life can grow out from anything, even the most visceral.
